
```{r}
testing %>% 
    pivot_longer(-date, names_to = "result", values_to = "cases") %>% 
    filter(str_detect(result, "cum_p|cum_n")) %>% 
    ggplot() +
    aes(date, cases, fill = result) +
    geom_col()

```

    geom_col()
